page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The people who collected this information in the Autumn of 1985 were: Mr.Stephen Smith,Headteacher of Hobkirk School;Mrs.Caroline Smith, his wife,also secretary of Hobkirk Community Council;and the children of the primary 4/7 class:Scott Martin, Kevin Thomson,Kevin Rae,Aaron Moulds, Briony Smith,Rona Bird,Sharon Dickson, Jennifer Bird,Carole Wilson,Lynn Thomson,Lynda Ridley,Olga Ridley, Scott Mabon,Lindsay Richardson,Louise Aitchison,Elizabeth McCallum,Barry Bryson,Leah Bryson,Diane Martin,David Johnston,Katy Buckley. Mr. and Mrs. M. MacManmon took the slides.
